errors.timeout: Timeout exceed. Reload page and try again
errors.unavailableToDownload: Can't reach file. Copy it from

backup.title: Backup
backup.rootfs_warning1: You cannot restore system state using this archive, it just allows you to have a copy of your files
backup.rootfs_warning2: System may run slower while downloading the archive
backup.rootfs_warning3: Files from /mnt/data are not included in the archive

factoryreset.title: Reset to factory settings
factoryreset.warning1: You can perform update with FIT file with settings reset (use Select firmware file button)
factoryreset.warning2: Or you can do full factory reset (use Perform factory reset button)
